column4: I just want to access a program that I installed. I don't know where it is because it doesn't show up in the main menu. I just made the switch, and if someone could point me in the right direction I would appreciate it.
Do you know what the executable name is?
emusic_linux_current.tar.gz is the only name I know of
Did you install it or just extract?
From the console do a 'which emusic' or something like that.
From the terminal, as root, do an updatedb && locate emusic
I'm sorr I don't know what that means. I guess I should have done a little more research before I fully switched. :P
You don't know how to run commands as root?
i guess not, or maybe I do and I just didn't know that what it was called...i'm betting I just didn't know though
I continue to feel inept..."Unknown id: su updatedb"
I guess I didn't fully install it because it seems to be located at /home/matthew/.emusic  but it's not present when I navigate there...okay thanks.
